## Course Topics

### [1. Stylized Facts of Cities](01-stylized-facts.html)

An introduction to the fundamental patterns that define cities - their structure, population density, and economic characteristics.

**Readings:**

- [Installing R & RStudio](https://rstudio-education.github.io/hopr/starting.html)
- [Installing Rmarkdown](https://bookdown.org/yihui/rmarkdown/installation.html)

- [Quality of Life Index for US Neighborhoods](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2015-06-29/a-new-index-maps-the-quality-of-life-for-2-000-u-s-neighborhoods)
